mapper.select: SELECT rent.rent_no , '1' lcns_idntf_cd , rent.vhcl_reg_no , TO_CHAR(rent.rent_bgng_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') rent_bgng_dt , TO_CHAR(rent.rent_end_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') rent_end_dt , rent.rent_stts_cd , NULL dln , rent.vhcl_reg_no , car.vin , car.carmdl , car.mdlyr , car.vhcl_nm , car.bzmn_sn , car.engine_fom , car.use_yn , car.sgg_cd , car.ownr_nm , TO_CHAR(car.reg_dt, 'yyyy-mm-dd') reg_dt FROM dqvs.dvs_dqv_mt_rent_new rent LEFT JOIN dqvs.dvs_rac_mt_car car ON rent.vhcl_reg_no = car.vhcl_reg_no WHERE rent.rent_stts_cd = '2' AND rent.del_yn = 'N' AND rent.rent_no = #{rentNo}
